name: jack-in-the-web
notes:
this is a fairly quick and simple holiday decoration. with #10 thread and a #7 hook (american), it should measure 11-12" after blocking/ pressing.

now available: 
russian translation by lamia knit - thank you lamia_knit!
stitch chart by masako kawahara - thank you masako!

the usual stuff applies - feel free to sell what you make using this pattern, but don't sell the pattern itself.  please don't post it (link to it instead), or claim it as your own.

most importantly, have fun!  and post your project photos!
